description: Design a data structure that supports two operations: add(point) — adds a new point to the data structure; count(point) — counts the number of ways to choose three points from the data structure such that the three points and the given point form an axis-aligned square with positive area.

examples.input: DetectSquares obj = new DetectSquares(); obj.add([3,10]); obj.add([11,2]); obj.add([3,2]); obj.count([11,10]); // returns 1; obj.count([14,8]); // returns 0; obj.add([11,2]); obj.count([11,10]); // returns 2

constraints: At most 3000 calls will be made to add and count
